The authors declare no competing ﬁnancial interest.
This work is ﬁnancially supported by the National Science
Foundation, National Institutes of Health, NIH NIBIB
EB018378-01 (R.E.R. and D.Y.) and the Department of
Energy through the Critical Materials Institute. This material is
based upon work supported by the National Science
Society for Engineering Education. D.Y. thanks Peixin Li and
Ting Yu for the “cryolite” crystal structure analysis, Xinxin Han
for the XRD Rietveld reﬁnement, and Atul D. Sontakke for
